gnat.representation
Class DefaultFeatureVector

java.lang.Object
  gnat.representation.DefaultFeatureVector
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureVector
public class DefaultFeatureVector
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeatureVector

Represents a feature vector. This vector values are stored in a hash table.

Author:
Conrad Plake, Joerg Hakenberg
